title: AuthGen - Authentication Key Generator
description: A Python GUI application (using PyQt) for generating, storing (SQLite), and managing time-based authentication keys with customizable durations.

title: GeoCipher - IP & Coordinate Geolocation Tool
description: A Python GUI application using PyQt6 to retrieve and display geographical information (city, country, etc.) from IP addresses or latitude/longitude coordinates via external APIs.

title: LockPickPDF - PDF Password Cracker
description: A Python GUI (PyQt6) tool to brute-force decrypt password-protected PDFs using a provided wordlist and the external qpdf library.

title: QuoteGen - Random Quote Generator
description: Python GUI (PyQt6) app generating random quotes from a large SQLite database, with translation (googletrans), text-to-speech (pyttsx3/gTTS), clipboard copy, and display customization.

title: PassGuard - Password Strength Checker & Generator
description: Python GUI tool (PyQt6) to assess password strength based on criteria (length, char types) and generate strong, random passwords.

title: QR Master - Custom QR Code Generator
description: A user-friendly Python GUI application (PyQt6) for generating custom QR codes from text or links and exporting them as PNG images.

title: Pixleon - Media Manipulation Suite
description: Versatile Python desktop GUI (PyQt6) for image/video tasks: background removal (rembg), format conversion, compression (Pillow/FFmpeg), and resizing.

title: Marketing Boosters Website
description: Built and customized a digital agency website using WordPress and a theme, focusing on branding, content presentation, and user experience.

title: SolutiiAI Website & AI Integration
description: Developed an SEO-optimized Next.js website integrating custom AI solutions, including intelligent chatbots and voice agents for enhanced customer interaction.

title: APIVulnMiner - API Vulnerability Scanner
description: An advanced, asynchronous API vulnerability scanner with AI-powered endpoint discovery, comprehensive OWASP Top 10 testing, and detailed reporting.
